description: Dr. Hogback's secret laboratory hidden within his mansion on Thriller Bark, where he conducts his zombie creation experiments. The lab contains operating tables, surgical equipment, and partially assembled corpses.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Hogback's Laboratory
keyEvents.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper discover Hogback's secret laboratory where he is actively working on creating zombies.
keyEvents.significance: The discovery of this laboratory confirms Hogback's direct involvement in creating the undead army on Thriller Bark.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational during the Thriller Bark arc

description: A large, gothic mansion on Thriller Bark where Dr. Hogback lives. It contains secret passages, hidden rooms, and Victoria Cindry's personal quarters filled with her memorabilia.

keyEvents.title: Escape Through Secret Passages
keyEvents.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper flee through the mansion's hidden passages while being chased by zombies.
keyEvents.significance: The mansion's layout and secret passages create suspense and lead to important discoveries.

keyEvents.title: Cindry's Room Discovery
keyEvents.description: The trio discovers a room filled with photographs and newspaper clippings about Victoria Cindry's past.
keyEvents.significance: This room reveals crucial information about Cindry's death and Hogback's obsession.

statusHistory.reason: Mansion is operational during the Thriller Bark arc

name.japanese: スリラーバークの墓地

description: A large graveyard on Thriller Bark where zombies emerge and roam. It serves as one of the main battlegrounds for the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Group Defeats Graveyard Zombies
keyEvents.description: After recovering from the Negative Hollows, Luffy's group defeats a platoon of zombies in the graveyard using coordinated attacks.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' ability to handle regular zombies despite new challenges from Perona's powers.

statusHistory.reason: Active location during the Thriller Bark arc
